page.title: 04CHRONICLE & ECHO-&-THE POST
page.content: On the 19/6/85 we went to the offices of the two newspapers above to gather local news.**There is to be a cycle race in the town centre tonight organized by the Michelin Tyre Company and Anglia Television.It is the most hazardous of the four town centre races to be run by them.**The town's Southern District is to benefit from the plans of the superstore giants Tesco to build Â£7.5m shopping complex there.It will reate more than 400 jobs.**Demolition men have levelled the South Midlands Co op abattoir and warehouses to make way for their new superstore.This marks the end of 3 years of struggle with the local residents-original plans to build a transport depot met a wall of protest because of the danger of an holocaust with so much fuel being stored.**There is a campaign to build a Mereway Sports Complex of stadium and swimming pool.
